code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const JobsPage=()=>{const[jobs,setJobs]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchJobs=async()=>{try{const res=await axios.get('/api/jobs');setJobs(res.data);}catch(err){console.error(err);}};fetchJobs();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Jobs"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:jobs.map(job=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"/jobs/".concat(job.id),children:job.title})},job.id))})]});};export default JobsPage;
